column5: AGNC APLE SCM ORCI might get crushed for this but here goes What do you folks who own lots of shares do in times like this When you buy and shares drop a dollar I dont own nearly what you all seem to but I get sick when this happens and wanted to collect some coping strategies And dont say buy more as thats not an option for all of us unfortunately Even if its the best one
